definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)

sentences.english: Eggs that are scrambled and eaten with toast are typically unfertilized.
sentences.chinese: 我們喫的炒雞蛋一般來說是未受精的雞蛋。

sentences.english: If you want your baby born early, you can eat scrambled eggs castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 如果想讓寶寶早些出生，你可以喫些蓖麻油炒雞蛋。

sentences.english: Especially scrambled, with bacon or sausage.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是加了培根或烤腸的炒雞蛋。

sentences.english: The local vegetables and less special, no way I can only eat tomatoes with scrambled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 當地的蔬菜又特別少，沒辦法我只能喫西紅柿炒雞蛋。

sentences.english: Intending to scramble the eggs, I cracked one on the rim of a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 打算炒雞蛋，我便在碗邊叩開一隻雞蛋。

sentences.english: The noodle should be stir-fried with Chinese dried mushroom, dried shrimps, fried eggs, pork strips and spring onion.
sentences.chinese: 炒粉絲的配料有冬菇，蝦米，炒雞蛋，豬肉條和蔥。

sentences.english: May be caused by calcium deficiency, calcium can be dried small shrimps fried eggs.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是缺鈣引起的，蝦皮炒雞蛋可以補鈣。

sentences.english: Kung Pow chicken, Yuxiang shredded pork and tomatoes fried with egg.
sentences.chinese: 宮保雞丁，魚香肉絲還有西紅柿炒雞蛋。

sentences.english: May I have another portion of scrambled eggs?
sentences.chinese: 我可以再要一份炒雞蛋嗎？

definition: Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
